trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，取決於節點類型。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他節點樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> property override any corresponding node style settings that are in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>屬性覆寫中的任何對應節點樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> property is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>屬性則不會與節點的方式呈現其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>屬性設定為`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> properties, which are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> objects, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> property is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>屬性，也就是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>控制節點的外觀，當滑鼠指標進入此屬性。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work, you must include a `<head>` element with a `runat="server"` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 讓範例能夠運作，您必須包含`<head>`具有項目`runat="server"`屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the group of images to use for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項的影像群組。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeViewImageSet" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeViewImageSet" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="TreeViewImageSet.Custom" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="TreeViewImageSet.Custom" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A> property to specify the group of images to use for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>屬性來指定要用於映像群組<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can either select a predefined set of images to give the control a standard look or define your own custom set.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選取一組預先定義的映像，以提供控制項的標準外觀，或定義您自己自訂的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A> property does not affect any style settings for a node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>屬性不會影響任何節點的樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: Set the appropriate style property, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A> property, if you want to add custom colors and spacing.
trans-unit.target: 設定適當的樣式屬性，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>屬性，如果您想要新增自訂色彩和間距。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid values for The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的有效值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Image set
trans-unit.target: 映像集

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: A predefined image set that uses arrow images.
trans-unit.target: 使用箭號映像的預先定義的映像集。

trans-unit.source: A predefined image set that uses diamond-shaped bullet images.
trans-unit.target: 使用菱形式的項目符號影像的預先定義的映像集。

trans-unit.source: A predefined image set that uses square-shaped bullet images.
trans-unit.target: 使用方形的項目符號影像的預先定義的映像集。

trans-unit.source: A predefined set of sectioned, diamond shaped bullet images.
trans-unit.target: 預先定義的分段、菱形項目符號影像集。

trans-unit.source: A predefined set of alternate sectioned, diamond shaped bullet images in sizes that vary by level.
trans-unit.target: 預先定義的替代分段、菱形項目符號影像集，影像的大小會因層級而異。

trans-unit.source: A predefined image set that uses MSN Messenger images.
trans-unit.target: 使用 MSN Messenger 映像的預先定義的映像集。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined image set.
trans-unit.target: 設定使用者定義的映像。

trans-unit.source: A predefined image set that uses event log-styled images.
trans-unit.target: 使用事件記錄檔樣式影像的預先定義的映像集。

trans-unit.source: A predefined image set that uses FAQ-styled images.
trans-unit.target: 使用常見問題集樣式影像的預先定義的映像集。

trans-unit.source: A predefined image set that uses email-styled images.
trans-unit.target: 使用電子郵件樣式影像的預先定義的映像集。

trans-unit.source: A predefined image set that uses newsgroup-styled images.
trans-unit.target: 預先定義的映像組，使用新聞群組樣式的影像。

trans-unit.source: A predefined image set that uses simple shape outlines.
trans-unit.target: 使用簡單的圖形外框的預先定義的映像集。

trans-unit.source: A predefined image set that uses simple filled shapes.
trans-unit.target: 使用簡單填滿的圖案的預先定義的映像集。

trans-unit.source: A predefined image set that uses MSDN images.
trans-unit.target: 使用 MSDN 映像的預先定義的映像集。

trans-unit.source: A predefined image set that uses Microsoft Windows Help images.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Microsoft Windows 說明的映像的預先定義的映像集。

trans-unit.source: A predefined image set that uses Windows Explorer images available in Microsoft Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Microsoft Windows XP 中可用的 Windows 檔案總管映像的預先定義的映像集。

trans-unit.source: When defining a custom set of images, you should specify an image for each of the properties in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 在定義一組自訂映像時，您應該指定映像的每一個屬性下表中。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the default image for that property is used.
trans-unit.target: 否則，會使用該屬性的預設影像。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The URL to a custom image for the collapsible node indicator.
trans-unit.target: 可摺疊節點指標的自訂影像 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to a custom image for the expandable node indicator.
trans-unit.target: 展開節點指示器的自訂影像 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to a folder that contains custom images for the lines that connect nodes.
trans-unit.target: 包含連接節點的線條的自訂映像資料夾的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator.
trans-unit.target: 無法展開節點指標的自訂影像 URL。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A> property to display the Windows Explorer set of images in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>屬性來顯示 Windows 檔案總管中的一組影像中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The specified image set is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeViewImageSet" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的影像集不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeViewImageSet" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of leaf nodes.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓您設定分葉節點的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> that represents the style of the leaf nodes in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> 的參考，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項中分葉節點的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the leaf nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制分葉節點中的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `LeafNodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>物件 (例如， `LeafNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `LeafNodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `LeafNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩、 字型屬性和節點間距。

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence:
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性會依下列優先順序套用：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，取決於節點類型。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他節點樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you need to generate table of contents–style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> property instead of setting the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要產生的目錄樣式導覽功能表，在特定層級的節點都必須有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子節點，您可以考慮使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>而不是設定個別的屬性樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the leaf nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制分葉節點中的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> objects that represent the node styles at the individual levels of the tree.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 物件的集合，表示位於樹狀結構中個別層級處的節點樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection" /> that represents the node styles at the individual levels of the tree.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection" />，表示位於樹狀結構中個別層級處的節點樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection as an alternative to the individual style properties (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A> property) to control the style of nodes at the individual levels of the tree.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>集合，做為個別的樣式屬性的替代方式 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>屬性) 來控制在個別的階層樹狀結構節點的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of nodes in the first level of the tree.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的第一個樣式會對應至第一層的樹狀結構中節點的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of nodes in the second level of the tree, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的第二個樣式會對應至樹狀目錄中，等第二層節點的樣式。

trans-unit.source: This property is most often used to generate table of contents–style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是最常用來產生目錄樣式導覽功能表的資料表，在特定層級的節點都必須有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子節點。

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性會套用順序如下：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，取決於節點類型。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他節點樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> property to create a navigation menu.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>建立導覽功能表的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The control is always fully expanded, with the expansion node indicators and images hidden.
trans-unit.target: 控制項始終是完全展開，展開節點指示器與隱藏的映像。

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.ChildNodesPadding%2A> property is used to control the spacing of the node levels.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle.ChildNodesPadding%2A>屬性用來控制節點層級的間距。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to a folder that contains the line images that are used to connect child nodes to parent nodes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料夾的路徑，該資料夾包含用於將子節點連接至父節點的線條影像。

trans-unit.source: The path to a folder that contains the line images used to connect nodes.
trans-unit.target: 資料夾的路徑，該資料夾包含用於連接節點的線條影像。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder" /> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control can display lines that connect child nodes to parent nodes when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項可以顯示連接至父節點的子節點的行時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: When lines are displayed, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A> property to specify a Web-accessible folder that contains the set of pre-rendered images to use for the lines.
trans-unit.target: 當顯示線條時，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A>屬性可指定網路存取的資料夾，其中包含一組用於線條預先呈現影像。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the images that are used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述所使用的映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Image
trans-unit.target: Image

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Dash.gif
trans-unit.target: Dash.gif

trans-unit.source: A line image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure and the root node is a leaf.
trans-unit.target: 樹狀結構中的只能有一個根節點與根節點時，根節點旁邊顯示的線條影像是分葉。

trans-unit.source: Dashminus.gif
trans-unit.target: Dashminus.gif

trans-unit.source: A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure to indicate that the root node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 減號 （-） 表示的根節點展開的樹狀結構中只能有一個根節點時，根節點旁邊顯示的影像。

trans-unit.source: Dashplus.gif
trans-unit.target: Dashplus.gif

trans-unit.source: A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure to indicate that the root node is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 表示根節點已摺疊樹狀結構中只能有一個根節點時，根節點旁顯示加號 （+） 映像。

trans-unit.source: I.gif
trans-unit.target: I.gif

trans-unit.source: A line image displayed to connect adjacent nodes.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的線條影像將相鄰的節點連接。

trans-unit.source: L.gif
trans-unit.target: L.gif

trans-unit.source: A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch when the node is a leaf.
trans-unit.target: 列旁邊顯示的影像到最後一個節點在分支中分葉節點時。

trans-unit.source: Lminus.gif
trans-unit.target: Lminus.gif

trans-unit.source: A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch to indicate that the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 列旁邊顯示的影像到最後一個節點，表示節點已展開分支中。

trans-unit.source: Lplus.gif
trans-unit.target: Lplus.gif

trans-unit.source: A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch to indicate that the node is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 列旁邊顯示的影像到最後一個節點，表示節點已摺疊的分支中。

trans-unit.source: Minus.gif
trans-unit.target: Minus.gif

trans-unit.source: A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 顯示包含多個根節點，表示節點的樹狀結構中之第一個根節點旁的減號 （-） 映像會展開。

trans-unit.source: This image does not contain an extra line and is displayed only after the root node has been collapsed once.
trans-unit.target: 此映像不包含額外的程式行，而且根節點已經摺疊一次之後，才會顯示。

trans-unit.source: When the page is first loaded, the Rminus.gif image is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當第一次載入頁面時，會顯示 Rminus.gif 映像。

trans-unit.source: Noexpand.gif
trans-unit.target: Noexpand.gif

trans-unit.source: A blank spacer image displayed next to a leaf node.
trans-unit.target: 空白的空格字元顯示的影像是分葉節點旁邊。

trans-unit.source: This image allows text to line up vertically.
trans-unit.target: 此映像可讓文字垂直對齊。

trans-unit.source: Plus.gif
trans-unit.target: Plus.gif

trans-unit.source: A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 顯示包含多個根節點，表示節點的樹狀結構中之第一個根節點旁的加號 （+） 映像會摺疊。

trans-unit.source: This image does not contain an extra line and is displayed only after the root node has been expanded once.
trans-unit.target: 此映像不包含額外的程式行，而且根節點已展開之後，才會顯示。

trans-unit.source: When the page is first loaded, the Rplus.gif image is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當第一次載入頁面時，會顯示 Rplus.gif 映像。

trans-unit.source: R.gif
trans-unit.target: R.gif

trans-unit.source: A line image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is a leaf node.
trans-unit.target: 在包含多個根節點，表示節點的樹狀結構中之第一個根節點旁顯示的線條影像為分葉節點。

trans-unit.source: Rminus.gif
trans-unit.target: Rminus.gif

trans-unit.source: A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 顯示包含多個根節點，表示節點的樹狀結構中之第一個根節點旁的減號 （-） 映像會展開。

trans-unit.source: This image contains an extra line and is displayed only when the page is first loaded.
trans-unit.target: 此映像包含額外的程式行，而且只在第一次載入頁面時，才會顯示。

trans-unit.source: After the root node has been collapsed once, The Minus.gif image is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 在根目錄之後節點已經摺疊一旦 Minus.gif 影像隨即顯示。

trans-unit.source: Rplus.gif
trans-unit.target: Rplus.gif

trans-unit.source: A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 顯示包含多個根節點，表示節點的樹狀結構中之第一個根節點旁的加號 （+） 映像會摺疊。

trans-unit.source: This image contains an extra line and is displayed only when the page is first loaded.
trans-unit.target: 此映像包含額外的程式行，而且只在第一次載入頁面時，才會顯示。

trans-unit.source: After the root node has been expanded once, the Plus.gif image is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 在根目錄之後已經展開節點之後，Plus.gif 影像隨即顯示。

trans-unit.source: T.gif
trans-unit.target: T.gif

trans-unit.source: A line image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is a leaf.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的線條影像的中間 （位於 t 交集處） 的樹狀節點旁，表示節點為分葉節點。

trans-unit.source: Tminus.gif
trans-unit.target: Tminus.gif

trans-unit.source: A minus sign (-) image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 減號 （-），表示節點已展開的中間 （位於 t 交集處） 的樹狀節點旁顯示影像。

trans-unit.source: Tplus.gif
trans-unit.target: Tplus.gif

trans-unit.source: A plus sign (+) image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 指出節點已摺疊的中間 （位於 t 交集處） 的樹狀節點旁顯示加號 （+） 映像。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control will use the built-in, default images (20 x 20 pixels).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A>未設定屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項將會使用內建的預設映像 （20 x 20 像素為單位）。

trans-unit.source: Some visual designers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio, provide tools to generate the line images.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化的設計工具，例如 Microsoft Visual Studio 提供工具來產生線條影像。

trans-unit.source: The run time does not flip custom images for right-to-left displays.
trans-unit.target: 在執行的階段不會翻轉由右至左顯示的自訂映像。

trans-unit.source: To support both left-to-right and right-to-left Web pages, you must create image sets for both directions.
trans-unit.target: 若要支援左到右及從右至左的網頁，您必須建立兩個方向的影像集合。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A> property to specify the folder that contains the line images to display in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A>屬性來指定包含要在中顯示的線條影像的資料夾<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To work with this example, use the Line Designer tool beforehand to create a set of line images.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此範例中，使用事先列設計工具 工具來建立一組線條影像。

trans-unit.source: Place them in a folder named LineImages within the directory for the sample application.
trans-unit.target: 請將它們放在目錄內命名 LineImages 範例應用程式的資料夾。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的索引鍵識別項。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: 所有內送名稱值的集合。

trans-unit.source: Processes postback data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 處理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項的回傳資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control's state changes as a result of the postback event; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果回傳事件的結果改變了 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項的狀態則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET page framework tracks all the server controls that return `true` from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LoadPostData%2A> method call, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method on those controls.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 網頁架構會追蹤所有傳回的伺服器控制項`true`從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LoadPostData%2A>方法呼叫中，然後再叫用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>這些控制項上的方法。

trans-unit.source: A object that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含控制項的已儲存檢視狀態值。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 載入先前儲存的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of tree levels to bind to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項之樹狀層級的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of tree levels to bind to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項之樹狀層級的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which binds all the tree levels in the data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 -1，會將資料來源中的所有樹狀層級繫結至控制項。

trans-unit.source: When binding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A> property to limit the number of tree levels to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: 繫結時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項至資料來源，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A>屬性來限制要繫結至控制項的樹狀目錄層級數目。

trans-unit.source: For example, setting this property to `2` binds only the root node and any nodes that are immediately under the root node to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，將此屬性設定為`2`根節點以及任何節點，會立即在根節點下，會將繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: All remaining nodes in the data source are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源中的所有其餘節點都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A malicious user can create a callback request and get data for the nodes of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control that the page developer is not displaying.
trans-unit.target: 惡意使用者可以建立回呼要求並取得資料的節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>網頁開發人員不顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, security of the data must be implemented by the data source.
trans-unit.target: 因此，資料來源必須實作之資料的安全性。

trans-unit.source: Do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A> property to hide data.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A>屬性隱藏的資料。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A> property to bind only the first two node levels (depths 0 and 1) to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A>屬性要繫結只有第一個兩個節點層級 （深度 0 和 1）<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A> property to bind only the first two node levels (depths 0 and 1) to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A>屬性要繫結只有第一個兩個節點層級 （深度 0 和 1）<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: All node levels in the data source are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源中的所有節點層級會被都忽略。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml.
trans-unit.target: 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Book.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會提供 XML 資料，上述程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The selected value is less than <see langword="-1" />.
trans-unit.target: 選取的值小於 <see langword="-1" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the indentation amount (in pixels) for the child nodes of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項之子節點的縮排量 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between a child node's left edge and its parent node's left edge.
trans-unit.target: 子節點左邊緣與其父節點左邊緣之間的空間量(以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 20.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 20。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeIndent%2A> property to control the amount of spacing between the left edge of a child node and the left edge of its parent node.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeIndent%2A>屬性，即可控制子節點的左邊的緣和其父節點的左邊的緣之間的間距數量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeIndent%2A> property affects every child node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeIndent%2A>屬性會影響在每個子節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to control the indentation amount of each node individually.
trans-unit.target: 您不可以個別控制每個節點的縮排數量。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeIndent%2A> property to control the indentation of child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeIndent%2A>屬性，即可控制子節點的縮排。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> objects that represents the root nodes in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 物件的集合，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項中的根節點。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection" /> that contains the root nodes in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 中的根節點。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A> property to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> object that contains all the root nodes in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>物件，其中包含在樹狀目錄中的所有根節點。

trans-unit.source: This collection is commonly used to quickly iterate through all the root nodes, or to access a specific root node in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合通常用來快速地逐一查看所有根節點，或存取特定根節點在樹狀目錄中。

trans-unit.source: A typical tree structure has only one root node; however, you can add multiple root nodes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 典型的樹狀結構有只有一個根節點。不過，您可以加入多個根節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A> property can also be used to manage the root nodes in the tree programmatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A>屬性也可用來以程式設計方式管理在樹狀目錄中的根節點。

trans-unit.source: You can add, insert, remove, and retrieve <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入、 插入、 移除及擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>從集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: Any updates to the collection are automatically reflected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control after the next round trip to the server.
trans-unit.target: 集合的任何更新會自動反映在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>往返到伺服器的下一步 後的控制項。

trans-unit.source: To access the child nodes of a root node, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> property of the node.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取根節點的子節點，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> property of each subsequent parent-level node to navigate down the node levels.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>節點層級下瀏覽每個後續的父層級節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A> property to traverse the tree.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A>周遊樹狀目錄的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> object that allows you to set the default appearance of the nodes in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓您設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項中節點的預設外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> that represents the default style of a node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> 的參考，表示節點的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A> property to control the default appearance of a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制中的節點的預設外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `NodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>物件 (例如， `NodeStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `NodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `NodeStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩、 字型屬性和節點間距。

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence:
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性會依下列優先順序套用：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，取決於節點類型。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他節點樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The corresponding node style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> properties override the style settings of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中對應的節點樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>屬性會覆寫的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> property instead of setting the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要產生的內容樣式導覽功能表，在特定層級的節點都必須有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子節點，您可以考慮使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>而不是設定個別的屬性樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制節點中的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether text wraps in a node when the node runs out of space.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出節點空間不足時節點中的文字是否換行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to wrap the text; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示文字應換行，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeWrap%2A> property to specify whether the text that is displayed in each node wraps when it runs out of space.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeWrap%2A>屬性來指定空間不足時，是否換行顯示每個節點中的文字。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeWrap%2A> property to wrap the text of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeWrap%2A>屬性的文字應換行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定無法展開節點指示器之自訂影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to a custom image to display for non-expandable nodes.
trans-unit.target: 為無法展開節點顯示之自訂影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which displays the default blank image.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，會顯示預設的空白影像。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A> property to specify a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定非可展開的節點指示器的自訂映像。

trans-unit.source: The non-expandable node indicator image (or spacer) is displayed next to leaf nodes (in place of the expandable and collapsible node indicators) to align the leaf nodes with parent or root nodes.
trans-unit.target: 無法展開節點指標影像 （或空格字元） 旁會顯示分葉節點 （取代的可展開及摺疊節點指標） 對齊父代或根節點的分葉節點。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項顯示加號 （+） 或減號 （-） 或影像預留位置，表示節點是否可展開、 摺疊，或無法展開分別節點旁邊。

trans-unit.source: You can specify custom images by first setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A> property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> properties to the URLs of the custom images.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定第一個設定的自訂映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>屬性`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然後設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>屬性，以自訂影像的 Url。

trans-unit.source: If no images are specified, the default images are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不指定任何影像，則會使用預設映像。

trans-unit.source: To hide the expansion node indicators, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要隱藏展開節點指示器，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that nodes align correctly in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> properties have the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 若要確認節點在正確對齊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制使用自訂映像時，請確定所指定的所有映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>屬性有相同的維度。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A> property to specify a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定非可展開的節點指示器的自訂映像。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to display and the image to appear in the control, you must provide your own image and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A> property must be set to `TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例，以顯示在控制項中顯示的映像，您必須提供自己的映像和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>屬性必須設定為`TreeNodeImageSet.Custom`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnInit%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnInit%2A>方法透過呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項引發<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>事件。

trans-unit.source: It is generally used by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> class.
trans-unit.target: 擴充時，它通常會由控制項開發人員使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>類別。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnInit%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnInit%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" />方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" />方法的基底類別，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnPreRender%2A> method is overridden to register for postback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnPreRender%2A>来註冊用於回傳覆寫方法。

trans-unit.source: If client script is enabled, it also renders the necessary script and hidden fields.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用用戶端指令碼，它也會呈現隱藏的欄位與必要的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnPreRender%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnPreRender%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" />方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" />方法的基底類別，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property of a node to specify which event is raised when that node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>屬性的節點指定選取該節點時，就會引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>的節點不會呈現其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>屬性設定為`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> event is raised when a node is expanded in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>在展開的節點時，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property for a node is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> event is also raised when that node is clicked in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>節點的屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>中按一下該節點時，也會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodeExpanded%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodeExpanded%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input.
trans-unit.target: 某些情況下，它並不實用靜態地預先定義的資料大小，或根據使用者輸入的自訂內容的樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control supports dynamic node population.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個緣故，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項支援動態節點母體擴展。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>節點的屬性設定為`true`，在執行階段的節點展開時填入該節點。

trans-unit.source: To populate a node dynamically, first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for the node to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要以動態方式填入節點，請先設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>屬性節點，以`true`。

trans-unit.source: Next, define an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event that programmatically populates the node.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，定義的事件處理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>以程式設計方式填入節點的事件。

trans-unit.source: A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of the node being populated.
trans-unit.target: 典型的事件處理方法會從資料來源擷取節點的資料、 將資料放入節點結構，和將節點結構<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>在擴展節點的集合。

trans-unit.source: A node structure is created by adding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of a parent node.
trans-unit.target: 節點結構由加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>父節點的集合。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>節點的屬性設定為`true`，必須以動態方式填入節點。

trans-unit.source: You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page.
trans-unit.target: 您無法以宣告方式建立巢狀其; 下的另一個節點否則，會在頁面上發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Supported browsers (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0-compatible browsers and later) can also take advantage of client-side node population.
trans-unit.target: 支援的瀏覽器 (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 相容的瀏覽器和更新版本) 也可以利用用戶端節點填入。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this allows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to populate a node on the client dynamically when that node is expanded, which prevents the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 啟用時，這可讓<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項來動態填入用戶端上的節點，展開該節點時，這會避免需回傳至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: For more information on client-side node population, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關用戶端節點母體擴展的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.OnTreeNodePopulate%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。
