trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of parent nodes in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓您設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項中父節點的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> that represents the style of the parent nodes in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> 的參考，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項中父節點的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制中的父節點的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `ParentNodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>物件 (例如， `ParentNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ParentNodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `ParentNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩、 字型屬性和節點間距。

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence:
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性會依下列優先順序套用：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，取決於節點類型。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他節點樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> property instead of setting the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要產生的內容樣式導覽功能表，在特定層級的節點都必須有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子節點，您可以考慮使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>而不是設定個別的屬性樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制中的父節點的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character that is used to delimit the node values that are specified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字元，用於分隔 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath" /> 屬性指定的節點值。

trans-unit.source: The character used to delimit the node values specified in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 用於分隔 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath" /> 屬性中指定之節點值的字元。

trans-unit.source: The default is a slash mark (/).
trans-unit.target: 預設為斜線符號 (/)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A> property contains a delimiter-separated list of node values that form a path from the root node to the current node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>屬性包含表單的目前節點的路徑從根節點的節點值的分隔符號分隔清單。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> property to specify the delimiter character that is used to separate the node values.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>屬性，以指定的分隔符號字元，用以分隔節點值。

trans-unit.source: This value is commonly used when parsing the list for the individual values.
trans-unit.target: 這個值通常用於剖析為個別值的清單。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the text that is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, the delimiter character might need to be changed to prevent any conflicts.
trans-unit.target: 根據文字中顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項，以避免任何衝突變更，可能需要分隔符號字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the delimiter character to a comma, the displayed text should not contain any commas; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A> property cannot be parsed accurately.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您設定逗號分隔符號字元，所顯示的文字不應該包含任何逗號;否則，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>屬性無法正確剖析。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> property to specify the delimiter character for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A> property of a node.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>屬性，以指定的分隔符號字元<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This value is then used to parse the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A> property for the individual values.
trans-unit.target: 此值，然後用來剖析<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>的個別值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates all the nodes based on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 依據資料來源建立所有節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PerformDataBinding%2A> method is a helper method that is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to bind the specified data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>指定的資料來源繫結至控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Because the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind" /> method is sealed, you should override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PerformDataBinding" /> method, if you need to perform any additional tasks when binding data.
trans-unit.target: 因為<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind" />方法已密封，您應該覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PerformDataBinding" />方法，如果您需要執行任何額外的工作，當資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether node data is populated on demand from the client.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否視用戶端的需要填入節點資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to populate tree node data on demand from the client; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示視用戶端的需要填入樹狀節點資料，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input.
trans-unit.target: 某些情況下，它並不實用靜態地預先定義的資料大小，或根據使用者輸入的自訂內容的樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control supports dynamic node population.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個緣故，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項支援動態節點母體擴展。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>節點的屬性設定為`true`，在執行階段的節點展開時填入該節點。

trans-unit.source: In addition to populating nodes on demand, it is possible to populate the nodes directly on a supported client browser.
trans-unit.target: 除了填入隨選的節點，便可填入直接上支援的用戶端瀏覽器的節點。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A> property is set to `true`, a service is called from the client to populate the tree nodes, which eliminates the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>屬性設定為`true`，服務會呼叫從用戶端填入樹狀結構節點中，如此就不需回傳至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control posts back to the server to populate the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項回傳至伺服器來填入節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.EnableClientScript%2A> property must also be set to `true` in order for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A> property to be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.EnableClientScript%2A>屬性也必須設定為`true`順序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: To populate a node on the client, first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A> property to `true` and then set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for the node to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要填入用戶端上的節點，請先設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>屬性`true`，然後設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>屬性節點，以`true`。

trans-unit.source: Next, define an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event that programmatically populates the node.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，定義的事件處理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>以程式設計方式填入節點的事件。

trans-unit.source: A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of the node being populated.
trans-unit.target: 典型的事件處理方法會從資料來源擷取節點的資料、 將資料放入節點結構，和將節點結構<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>在擴展節點的集合。

trans-unit.source: You create a node structure by adding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of a parent node.
trans-unit.target: 您將建立的節點結構<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>父節點的集合。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>節點的屬性設定為`true`，必須以動態方式填入節點。

trans-unit.source: You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page.
trans-unit.target: 您無法以宣告方式建立巢狀其; 下的另一個節點否則，會在頁面上發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The client-side node population feature is supported in browsers that support callback scripts.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器支援回呼指令碼支援的用戶端節點母體擴展的功能。

trans-unit.source: To check whether a browser supports callback scripts access, use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查瀏覽器是否支援回呼指令碼存取，請使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can access the instance of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class for the current request through the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取的執行個體<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>類別目前的要求，透過<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>類別。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A> property to enable client-side population of the nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>屬性來啟用用戶端母體擴展中的節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Notice that when client-side node population is enabled, nodes are populated dynamically on the client, without the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，當啟用用戶端節點擴展時，節點會自動填入用戶端，而不需回傳至伺服器上。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an optional event argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表要傳遞至事件處理常式的選擇性事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Raises the callback event using the specified arguments.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的引數引發回呼事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> method is a helper method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> 方法是 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> 方法的 Helper 方法。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an optional event argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表要傳遞至事件處理常式的選擇性事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Enables the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control to process an event that is raised when a form is posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項，以處理當表單回傳至伺服器時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" /> method is a helper method for the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System#Web#UI#ICallbackEventHandler#RaiseCallbackEvent(System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" /> 方法是 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System#Web#UI#ICallbackEventHandler#RaiseCallbackEvent(System.String)" /> 方法的 Helper 方法。

trans-unit.source: The page passes the value of the `eventArgument` parameter to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method of the control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 頁面值傳遞給`eventArgument`參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>之控制項的實作方法<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control also renders the HTML element that causes the postback event to occur.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項也會轉譯導致回傳事件發生的 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: If the control renders client-side script to post back to the server, the argument from the script is passed in the `eventArgument` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項轉譯回傳至伺服器的用戶端指令碼時，傳入的引數，從指令碼`eventArgument`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the postback event is caused by a simple submit to the server, the `eventArgument` parameter is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果因為簡單回傳事件提交至伺服器，`eventArgument`參數是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method provides the functionality for many events that are implemented by HTML and Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>方法提供許多事件會由 HTML 和 Web 伺服器控制項所實作的功能。

trans-unit.source: Signals the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control to notify the ASP.NET application that the state of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通知 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項應告知 ASP.NET 應用程式，控制項的狀態已變更。

trans-unit.source: Change events for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control are raised from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 變更事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所引發的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，代表要在用戶端呈現 HTML 內容的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Renders the HTML opening tag of the control to the specified writer.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項的 HTML 開頭標記呈現在指定的寫入器中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RenderBeginTag%2A> method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RenderBeginTag%2A>方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that represents the output stream used to write content to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，代表用來將內容寫入 Web 網頁的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Renders the nodes in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項中呈現節點。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RenderContents%2A> method to render the nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to the client.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RenderContents%2A>方法以呈現在節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>用戶端的控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，代表要在用戶端呈現 HTML 內容的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Renders the HTML closing tag of the control to the specified writer.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項的 HTML 結尾標記呈現至指定的寫入器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RenderEndTag%2A> method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RenderEndTag%2A>方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of the root node in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓您設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項中根節點的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> that represents the style of the root node in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> 的參考，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項中根節點的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the root node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制中的根節點的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `RootNodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>物件 (例如， `RootNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RootNodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `RootNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩、 字型屬性和節點間距。

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence:
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性會依下列優先順序套用：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，取決於節點類型。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他節點樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> property instead of setting the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要產生的內容樣式導覽功能表，在特定層級的節點都必須有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子節點，您可以考慮使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>而不是設定個別的屬性樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the root node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制中的根節點的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 儲存 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The server control's current view state; otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if there is no view state associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器控制項的目前檢視狀態；如果沒有與控制項關聯的檢視狀態，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> object that represents the selected node in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 物件，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項中選取的節點。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> that represents the selected node in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" />，表示在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 中選取的節點。

trans-unit.source: The text of a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control can be in one of two modes: selection mode and navigation mode.
trans-unit.target: 在節點的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項可以處於兩種模式： 選取模式和瀏覽模式。

trans-unit.source: By default, a node is in selection mode.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，節點處於選取模式。

trans-unit.source: To put a node into navigation mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property for the node to a value other than an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 若要將節點放入瀏覽模式中，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性的節點為空字串以外的值 ("")。

trans-unit.source: To put a node into selection mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property for the node to empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 節點處於選取模式中，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性的節點為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When a node is in selection mode, the user can select a node by clicking on the text in the node.
trans-unit.target: 當節點處於選取模式時，使用者可以按一下節點來選取節點中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property to determine which node is selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>屬性來判斷哪一個節點中選取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A node cannot be selected when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 節點不能為時選取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項會顯示超連結。

trans-unit.source: When hyperlinks are displayed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 當顯示超連結時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>屬性一律會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a different node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control by clicking the text in the new node, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event is raised, by default.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者選取的不同節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>即可在新的節點中，文字控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>引發事件時，根據預設。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a different event by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property for the property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定來指定不同的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available options.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的選項。

trans-unit.source: Selection action
trans-unit.target: 選取動作

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 切換展開或摺疊節點。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> event, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed>事件，視需要。

trans-unit.source: Raises no events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 選取節點時，不引發任何事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 選取節點時，引發 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 選取節點時，引發 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> 和 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 只會展開節點，而不會摺疊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>的節點不會呈現其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>屬性設定為`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property to determine the value of the selected node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>屬性來判斷所選取的節點中的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a node is selected in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 當在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項中選取節點時就會發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event is raised when a node is selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>中選取節點時，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating the displayed content, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如更新顯示的內容時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property for a node to specify which event is raised when that node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>屬性節點，以指定選取該節點時，就會引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available options.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的選項。

trans-unit.source: Selection action
trans-unit.target: 選取動作

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 切換展開或摺疊節點。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> event, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed>事件，視需要。

trans-unit.source: Raises no events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 選取節點時，不引發任何事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 選取節點時，引發 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 選取節點時，引發 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> 和 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 只會展開節點，而不會摺疊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>的節點不會呈現其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>屬性設定為`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event is fired only on post back when a user clicks a node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>時使用者按下一個節點只能在 post 上引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The event is not fired if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property is changed programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果未引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>屬性以程式設計方式變更。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event to update a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control when a node is selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>事件來更新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制項中選取節點時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> object that controls the appearance of the selected node in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> 物件，其控制 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項中已選取節點的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" /> that represents the style of the selected node in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項中已選取節點的樣式。

trans-unit.target: 預設為 <see langword="null" />，表示 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle" /> 屬性未設定。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制中的選定節點的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>物件 (例如， `SelectedNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SelectedNodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `SelectedNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩、 字型屬性和節點間距。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the selected node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制中的選定節點的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the selected node.
trans-unit.target: 取得已選取節點的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the selected node.
trans-unit.target: 已選取節點的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A> property provides a convenient way to determine the value of the selected node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A>屬性提供便利的方式來決定選取之節點的值。

trans-unit.source: This property simply returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that is referred to by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會傳回的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>所參考的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If no node is currently selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, an empty string ("") is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有節點中目前選取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制，則為空字串 ("") 會傳回。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> to set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set the node as data-bound; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要設定節點為資料繫結，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Allows a derived class to set whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> control is data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 允許衍生類別設定指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 控制項是否為資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SetNodeDataBound%2A> method to indicate whether the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> is data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SetNodeDataBound%2A>方法，指出是否指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>是資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SetNodeDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode,System.Boolean)" /> method is provided to allow a control that is derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control to set the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.DataBound" /> property on a node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SetNodeDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode,System.Boolean)" />方法提供來讓衍生自控制項<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" />控制來設定<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.DataBound" />節點上的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> to set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" />。

trans-unit.source: The data item for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: Allows a derived class to set the data item for the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 允許衍生類別設定指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 控制項的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SetNodeDataItem%2A> method to specify the data item for the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SetNodeDataItem%2A>方法，以指定所指定的資料項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> to set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" />。

trans-unit.source: The data path for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 的資料路徑。

trans-unit.source: Allows a derived class to set the data path for the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 允許衍生類別設定指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 控制項的資料路徑。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SetNodeDataPath%2A> method to set the data path for the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SetNodeDataPath%2A>方法，以設定所指定的資料路徑<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating which node types will display a check box in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出哪些節點型別會在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項中顯示核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="TreeNodeType.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="TreeNodeType.None" />。

trans-unit.source: To provide multi-node selection support in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, you can display check boxes next to the image for a node.
trans-unit.target: 多節點選取項目中提供支援<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項，您可以顯示的映像 節點旁邊的核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property to specify which node types will display a check box.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>屬性，以指定哪種節點類型會顯示核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: For example, if this property is set to `TreeNodeType.Parent`, check boxes are displayed for each parent node in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果這個屬性設定為`TreeNodeType.Parent`，核取方塊會顯示在樹狀目錄中每個父節點。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid values for this property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出這個屬性的有效值。

trans-unit.source: Node type
trans-unit.target: 節點類型

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Check boxes are displayed for all nodes.
trans-unit.target: 核取方塊會顯示所有節點。

trans-unit.source: Check boxes are displayed for all leaf nodes.
trans-unit.target: 所有分葉節點會顯示核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: Check boxes are not displayed.
trans-unit.target: 不會顯示核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: Check boxes are displayed for all parent nodes.
trans-unit.target: 核取方塊會顯示所有父節點。

trans-unit.source: Check boxes are displayed for all root nodes.
trans-unit.target: 核取方塊會顯示為所有根節點。

trans-unit.source: The enumeration type that is used for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property is a flag enumeration, which allows you to combine values through bitwise operations.
trans-unit.target: 用於列舉型別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>屬性是旗標列舉，可讓您結合透過位元運算的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, to display check boxes for the parent and leaf nodes, use the bitwise OR operator to combine the `TreeNodeType.Parent` and `TreeNodeType.Leaf` values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要顯示父節點和分葉節點的核取方塊，使用位元 OR 運算子結合`TreeNodeType.Parent`和`TreeNodeType.Leaf`值。

trans-unit.source: To determine which nodes have their check box selected, iterate through the nodes of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷哪一個節點擁有其核取方塊選取，逐一查看的節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> setting by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property for each node.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>設定所設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>每個節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you need to provide only single-selection support, consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要提供只有單一選取支援，請考慮使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property to show and hide the check boxes for the different node types.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>屬性來顯示和隱藏不同節點型別的核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: The bitwise combination value is outside the range of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 位元組合值超出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes" /> 列舉型別的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether expansion node indicators are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否顯示展開節點指示器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show the expansion node indicators; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示顯示展開節點指示器，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Expansion node indicators are used to show whether a node is expanded, collapsed, or non-expandable.
trans-unit.target: 展開節點指標用來顯示節點是否已展開、 摺疊，或無法展開。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A> property to specify whether the expansion node indicators are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>屬性來指定是否展開節點指示器會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項顯示加號 （+） 或減號 （-） 或影像預留位置，表示節點是否可展開、 摺疊，或無法展開分別節點旁邊。

trans-unit.source: You can specify custom images by first setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A> property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> properties to the URLs of the custom images.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定第一個設定的自訂映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>屬性`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然後設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>屬性，以自訂影像的 Url。

trans-unit.source: If no images are specified, the default images are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不指定任何影像，則會使用預設映像。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A> property to show and hide the expansion node icons.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>屬性來顯示和隱藏擴充節點圖示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether lines connecting child nodes to parent nodes are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否顯示將子節點連接至父節點的線條。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display lines connecting nodes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示顯示連接節點的線條，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> property to specify whether the lines that are connecting child nodes to parent nodes are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>屬性來指定是否要顯示要連接至父節點的子節點的線條。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control searches the Web-accessible folder that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A> property for the line images.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項搜尋所指定的 Web 存取資料夾<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A>線條影像的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control will use the built-in, default images (20 x 20 pixels).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A>未設定屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項將會使用內建的預設映像 （20 x 20 像素為單位）。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> property to display lines connecting nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>屬性來顯示連線節點中的行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to use the Line Designer tool to create a set of line images and place them in a folder named LineImages within the directory for the sample application.
trans-unit.target: 請務必使用行設計師工具來建立一組線條影像，並將它們放在命名 LineImages 目錄中的範例應用程式的資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that is used to render alternate text for screen readers to skip the content for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，用於呈現替代文字，以便讓螢幕助讀員略過控制項內容。

trans-unit.source: A string that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> renders as alternate text with an invisible image as a hint to screen readers.
trans-unit.target: 字串，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 在不可見影像上呈現的替代文字，做為螢幕助讀員的提示。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Skip Navigation Links."
trans-unit.target: 預設值是「略過巡覽連結」。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SkipLinkText%2A> property is a property that you can set to make a Web page more or less accessible.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SkipLinkText%2A>屬性是您可以設定讓網頁更多或少都能存取的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Web pages that contain content that repeats can provide for a mechanism for users of screen readers to skip the content from being read aloud.
trans-unit.target: 一種機制，以略過的內容來自大聲閱讀螢幕助讀程式的使用者可以提供網頁包含重複的內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SkipLinkText%2A> property as a way for the entire control to be skipped by screen readers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SkipLinkText%2A>屬性做為螢幕助讀程式所要略過整個控制項的方式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SkipLinkText%2A> property is set, an invisible image with alternate text is rendered, giving the user the option to jump to the end of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SkipLinkText%2A>屬性設定，呈現不可見的影像的替代文字，讓使用者選擇跳至控制項的結尾。

trans-unit.source: Screen readers read the alternate text aloud, while the image occupies only one pixel space.
trans-unit.target: 螢幕助讀程式大聲的替代文字，而影像佔用一個像素的空間。

trans-unit.source: For pixel-precise control over the rendering of the page, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SkipLinkText%2A> property to an empty string ("") and provide your own mechanism to skip the tree.
trans-unit.target: 像素精確控制呈現頁面的詳細資訊，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SkipLinkText%2A>屬性設為空字串 ("")，並提供您自己的機制，以略過樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SkipLinkText%2A> property is set to the empty string by default, which makes screen readers not skip the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SkipLinkText%2A>根據預設，讓螢幕助讀員略過控制項屬性設定為空字串。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a callback event that targets a control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回以控制項為目標之回呼事件的結果。

trans-unit.source: The results of the callback.
trans-unit.target: 回呼的結果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> interface and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> to retrieve data and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.GetCallbackResult%2A> method to return the retrieved data to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制實作<xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler>介面並使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>來擷取資料和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.GetCallbackResult%2A>方法來擷取的資料傳回至控制項。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an optional event argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表要傳遞至事件處理常式的選擇性事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Raises the callback event using the specified arguments.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的引數引發回呼事件。

trans-unit.source: Control developers should override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 控制項開發人員應該覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaiseCallbackEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的索引鍵識別項。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: 所有內送名稱值的集合。

trans-unit.source: Processes postback data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 處理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項的回傳資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control's state changes as a result of the postback event; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果回傳事件的結果改變了 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項的狀態則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Control developers should override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LoadPostData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 控制項開發人員應該覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LoadPostData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Signals the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control to notify the ASP.NET application that the state of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通知 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項應告知 ASP.NET 應用程式，控制項的狀態已變更。

trans-unit.source: Control developers should override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 控制項開發人員應該覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an optional event argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表要傳遞至事件處理常式的選擇性事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Enables the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control to process an event that is raised when a form is posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項，以處理當表單回傳至伺服器時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: Control developers should override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 控制項開發人員應該覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> value for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Always returns a <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag.Div" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一定會傳回 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag.Div" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TagKey%2A> property allows the output stream to write the appropriate HTML mark-up for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TagKey%2A>屬性可讓輸出資料流寫入適當 HTML 標記的總<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TagKey" /> property to specify which <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> value to use for your derived control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TagKey" />屬性以指定的<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" />用於衍生的控制項值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content that is associated with a node.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目標視窗或框架，在其中顯示與節點關聯的 Web 網頁內容。

trans-unit.source: The target window or frame in which to display the linked Web page content.
trans-unit.target: 在其中顯示連結 Web 網頁內容的目標視窗或框架。

trans-unit.source: Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 除了以底線為開頭的某些特殊值以外，值必須以 A 到 Z (不區分大小寫) 範圍內的字母為開頭，如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Target value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 目標值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Renders the content in
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 中呈現內容

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term><see langword="_blank" /></term><description> A new window without frames.
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term><see langword="_blank" /></term><description> 新視窗，而不用框架。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_parent" /></term><description> The immediate frameset parent.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_parent" /></term><description> 即時運算框架組的父代。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_search" /></term><description> The search pane.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_search" /></term><description> [搜尋] 窗格中。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_self" /></term><description> The frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_self" /></term><description> 具有焦點的框架。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_top" /></term><description> The full window without frames.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="_top" /></term><description> 框架不完整的視窗。

trans-unit.source: Check your browser documentation to determine if the <see langword="_search" /> value is supported.
trans-unit.target: 請查閱您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否支援 <see langword="_search" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later supports the <see langword="_search" /> target value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 (含) 以後版本支援 <see langword="_search" /> 目標值。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，會重新整理擁有焦點的視窗或框架。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A> property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content that is linked to a node when that node is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A>屬性，以指定的視窗或框架中顯示 Web 內容的連結節點時按一下該節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A> property renders as a `target` attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A>屬性轉譯成`target`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition.
trans-unit.target: `target`屬性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許項目。

trans-unit.source: Do not set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A> property, if the rendered output for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> must be XHTML 1.1 compliant.
trans-unit.target: 請勿設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A>屬性，如果轉譯的輸出為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>必須 XHTML 1.1 相容。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。

trans-unit.source: When creating accessible Web pages, you should avoid using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A> property to target another window.
trans-unit.target: 在建立可存取網頁時，您應該避免使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A>指向另一個視窗中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A> property to display the Web content that is linked to a node in a new window when that node is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A>屬性來顯示 Web 內容在按下該節點時，連結至新視窗中的節點。

trans-unit.source: Tracks view-state changes to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control so that they can be stored in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object for the control.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項的檢視狀態變更，讓這些變更能夠儲存在控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> is accessible through the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 可透過 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> 屬性存取。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TrackViewState%2A> method is overridden to mark the starting point to begin tracking and saving changes to the control as part of the view state for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TrackViewState%2A>標示的起點開始追蹤並儲存變更至控制項的控制項檢視狀態的一部分，會覆寫方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a check box in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control changes state between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項的核取方塊在張貼至伺服器之間變更狀態時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCheckChanged> event is raised when a check box in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control changes state between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCheckChanged>中核取方塊時，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項變更發佈至伺服器之間的狀態。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a database or the displayed content, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如更新資料庫或顯示的內容時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Even though the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCheckChanged> event is fired on post back, changing a check box does not cause a post back.
trans-unit.target: 即使<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCheckChanged>事件會在回傳，變更核取方塊不會導致回傳。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCheckChanged> event to update a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control when the check boxes of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control change state between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCheckChanged>事件來更新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>負責控制何時核取方塊的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項變更發佈至伺服器之間的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a node is collapsed in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 當在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項中摺疊節點時就會發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> event is raised when a node is collapsed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed>中摺疊的節點時，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> event to update the content of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control when the user collapses a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed>事件，以更新的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制當使用者摺疊中的節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a data item is bound to a node in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 當資料項目繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項中的節點時就會發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeDataBound> event is raised when a data item is bound to a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeDataBound>資料項目所繫結中的節點時，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeDataBound> event to change the image for a node when some condition is met.
trans-unit.target: 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeDataBound>事件以某些條件符合時，變更節點的影像。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeDataBound> event to change the image for a node when some condition is met.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeDataBound>事件以某些條件符合時，變更節點的影像。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml.
trans-unit.target: 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，為 Book.xml 檔案之後所提供的範例 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: Also be sure to provide your own images for this example to display.
trans-unit.target: 另外請務必提供這個範例顯示的影像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會提供 XML 資料，上述程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a node is expanded in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 當在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控制項中展開節點時就會發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> event is raised when a node is expanded in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>在展開的節點時，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property for a node is set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand` or `TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> event is also raised when that node is clicked in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>節點的屬性設定為`TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand`或`TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>中按一下該節點時，也會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> event to update the content of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control when the user expands a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>事件，以更新的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制當使用者擴充中的節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a node with its <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand" /> property set to <see langword="true" /> is expanded in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 當在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand" /> 控制項中展開 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 屬性設為 <see langword="true" /> 的節點時發生。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input.
trans-unit.target: 某些情況下，它並不實用靜態地預先定義的資料大小，或根據使用者輸入的自訂內容的樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control supports dynamic node population.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個緣故，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項支援動態節點母體擴展。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>節點的屬性設定為`true`，在執行階段的節點展開時填入該節點。

trans-unit.source: To populate a node dynamically, first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for the node to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要以動態方式填入節點，請先設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>屬性節點，以`true`。

trans-unit.source: Next, define an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event that populates the node programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，定義的事件處理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>以程式設計方式填入節點的事件。

trans-unit.source: A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of the node being populated.
trans-unit.target: 典型的事件處理方法會從資料來源擷取節點的資料、 將資料放入節點結構，和將節點結構<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>在擴展節點的集合。

trans-unit.source: A node structure is created by adding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of a parent node.
trans-unit.target: 節點結構由加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>父節點的集合。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>節點的屬性設定為`true`，必須以動態方式填入節點。

trans-unit.source: You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page.
trans-unit.target: 您無法以宣告方式建立巢狀其; 下的另一個節點否則，會在頁面上發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Supported browsers (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0-compatible browsers and later) can also take advantage of client-side node population.
trans-unit.target: 支援的瀏覽器 (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 相容的瀏覽器和更新版本) 也可以利用用戶端節點填入。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this allows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to populate a node dynamically on the client when that node is expanded, which prevents the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 啟用時，這可讓<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項來擴展以動態方式在用戶端上的節點展開該節點時，這會避免需回傳至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: For more information on client-side node population, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關用戶端節點母體擴展的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event to populate the nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control dynamically on the server.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>事件，以填入中的節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>以動態方式在伺服器上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.EnableClientScript%2A> property is set to `false` to prevent expanding-node events from being handled on the client.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.EnableClientScript%2A>屬性設定為`false`來防止在用戶端上處理的展開節點事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is rendered as UI on the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否要呈現為網頁上的 UI。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the control is visible on the page; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項在網頁上可見則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Visible%2A> property is set to `false`, the control is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Visible%2A>屬性設定為`false`，則不會呈現控制項。
